intro: Celmisia brownii, commonly known as the Brown's celmisia, is a flowering plant native to New Zealand. It belongs to the family Gentianaceae and is characterized by its upright growth habit and showy, blue to violet flowers. Celmisia brownii is often found in rocky or scree habitats and is adapted to the harsh environmental conditions of its native range.
